attributes.action: Reconsider the sentencing in the grooming cases
attributes.additional_details: These cases are going back to 2009 some before when the girls claim they was being groomed by these individuals first of all there is no evidence against these men they have been sentenced to ten fifteen some life for the hear say of some young girls no evidence these men some of them was the same age as the girls and was in relationship with them so how is it classes as grooming these men have children and families of there own who are suffering because of these ridiculous sentencing
attributes.background: The police recently did cases from 2016-2018 arresting asain males from Rotherham, Sheffield and Huddersfield for being involved in grooming gangs I would like the government to reopen these cases and if found guilty then give sentencing based on evidence against these individuals

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition because sentencing is a matter for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
